name: World Heritage Site
notes: Site of global cultural or natural importance

name: National Park
notes: Protected area for natural beauty and recreation

name: Site of Special Scientific Interest (SSSI)
notes: Protected for wildlife, geology, or landform

name: National Nature Reserve
notes: Important area for wildlife and conservation

name: Conservation Area
notes: Area designated for historical or architectural significance

name: Special Area of Conservation
notes: Designated under the EU Habitats Directive

name: Special Protection Area/Ramsar site
notes: Protected for bird species under the EU Birds Directive

name: Green Belt
notes: Area designated to prevent urban sprawl
